description: Explore GitHub repository documentation by topic to quickly understand any project. Open pages on demand and ask questions to get concise answers. Find what you need faster across complex wikis.

capabilities.name: read_wiki_structure
capabilities.description: Get a list of documentation topics for a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: read_wiki_contents
capabilities.description: View documentation about a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: ask_question
